anatomicalDefinition: length from the tip of the snout to the posterior-most part of trunk that meets the caudal fin
length across the eye along the anterior-posterior (left-right) axis (landmarks #14 & #15)
length from the anterior-most (left-most) part of the head (landmark #1) to the posterior-most (right-most) part of the head (landmark #12)
length from the dorsal-most (top) part of the head to the ventral-most (bottom) part of the head through the midline of the eye (landmark #18)
length from the anterior-most (left-most) part of the eye (landmark #14) to the anterior-most (left-most)part of the head (landmark #1)
length from the tip of the snout to the posterior-most part of the caudal fin
length of the body along the dorsal-ventral (upper-lower) axis, between the dorsal and pelvic fins
length from the dorsal-most (top) part of the head (landmark #2) to the ventral-most (bottom) part of the head (landmark #13)
